q: I suspect I always will. I take the blame because, ultimately, it was my responsibility. I am not asking for any sympathy, I suspect that I am unlikely to get any here today. If a rogue reporter decides to behave in that fashion, I am not sure there is an awful lot more I could have done. I have never condoned the use of phone hacking and nor do I have any recollection of incidences where phone hacking took place. Mike Missanelli committed an unintentional violation while interviewing Eagles quarterback Michael Vick on his radio show yesterday. Mike Missanelli reminded Michael Vick that DeSean Jackson made some comments about the quarterback's game-ending interception against the Packers. What's the story with DeSean Jackson ? asked Mike Missanelli "Is he just a young pup who talks out of turn every now and then and you're the wily veteran now, and you have to kinda hit the pup on the nose?"

, a game in which the Eagles trailed by 21 points in the fourth quarter. " Michael Vick has great instincts. Michael Vick 's got it all at this point," Eagles offensive co-ordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game.
